# inputFaceObservations

**Instance Property**

An array of face-observation objects to process as part of the request.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputFaceObservations: [FaceObservation]?
```

## Discussion

The default is `nil`. When `nil`, Vision first performs a [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/DetectFaceRectanglesRequest] and processes all faces detected.
title: inputFaceObservations
